lines:
Telegraphic Address:

IMPERIAL, TIENTSIN.

Rick.

W YOUR REPE

6 IMPERIAL CHINESE RAILWAYS 2

Engineer in Chief's Office .

FERENC

GIVE TV

TO YOUR LETTER

REFERENCE -

Tongshan sth. Haren

n.

9th. March

1908.

A. E, Stearns Esq, 
Phillips Academy,

Andover,

Mass.,

V. S. An, 
Dear Sir,

I am requested by Mr Luk Show Cho's father to send you 
the enclosed demand draft No.45/46 for Gold dollars five hundrea, 
payable to your goodself, will you kindly cash it and either hand 
this sum to Mr. Luk Chow Cho or credit it to his account with you.

Formerly the sending of money was carried on, through the 
kindness of Mr. Tong Kaisun, but just at present this gentleman is 
at Shanghai, so I was asked to do it, this time.

Please kindly ask Mr. Luk Chow Cho to acknowledge this 
on receipt to his father and with best regards,

Yours truly.

AS. Luk

Please kindly ask Mr. Luk Chow Cho to acknowledge this  on receipt to his father and with best regards,  Yours truly.  AS. Luk

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter sending a draft for $500 gold as per the request from Luk Sho Cho's father. Luk explains that he is doing this since Mr. Kaison is away in Shanghai. Luk asks that the money be given to the Luk Sho Cho or be credited to Cho's account.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
